    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.lib.util
    since 1.6.0; This package was moved out of the public API.

    since 1.8.0; use MiniAccumuloCluster or a standard mock framework instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.data.ComparableBytes
    since 1.7.0 In an attempt to clean up types in the data package that were not intended to be in public API this type was deprecated. Technically this method was not considered part of the public API in 1.6.0 and earlier, therefore it could have been deleted. However a decision was made to deprecate in order to be cautious and avoid confusion between 1.6.0 and 1.7.0.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.data.KeyExtent
    since 1.7.0 use TabletId
    org.apache.accumulo.core.security.VisibilityConstraint
    since 1.7.0 This is server side code not intended to exist in a public API package. This class references types that are not in the public API and therefore is not guaranteed to be stable. It was deprecated to clearly communicate this. Use VisibilityConstraint instead.
